teams.name: Kiva Detroit
teams.loan_because: We want to champion small businesses in Detroit!
teams.description:
Kiva Detroit is the first Kiva City, a program where Kiva works with community organizations in the United States to provide local small businesses with microloans. 

The goal of the Kiva Detroit team is to empower Detroiters to champion local small businesses through Kiva. 

To double your impact, your loan to a Kiva Detroit borrower will be matched 1-to-1 by the Knight Foundation

teams.name: Team Ottawa

teams.description: We are lenders from the region of Canada's capital!  Nous sommes des preteurs de la region de la capitale du Canada!

teams.name: CHERNOBYL KIDS
teams.loan_because: It is important to help whenever and wherever we can.
teams.description:
CHERNOBYL CHILDREN LIFE LINE (Inverness, Scotland Link)
Registered Charity No.  SCO40136

Remember the Chernobyl nuclear disaster of April 1986?
This team supports 'Chernobyl children' and their families living in the regions of Belarus and Ukraine contaminated by caesium 137 - a great risk to their health.
Many of these children visit the UK (and other countries) to improve their health and the organisation of such trips and/or an interest in the effects of the disaster and how to protect our environment from the human race should be the main reason for joining this team.

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising

teams.name: Filipino Americans for Economic Development

teams.name: HALF THE SKY: Empowering Women
teams.loan_because: we believe empowering women is the key to alleviating social injustice and achieving world stability.
teams.description:
Inspired by the book HALF THE SKY written by Nicholas Kristof and Sheryl WuDunn, our team is committed to helping curb culturally accepted abuse of women around the world.

Facebook page: http://www.facebook.com/HALFTHESKYEmpoweringWomenKIVATeam

teams.name: Friends of Bob Harris
teams.loan_because:
After stumbling into a job as a luxury travel writer, I saw so much poverty that I decided to turn those paychecks into Kiva loans. Then I visited a bunch of clients, who were amazing, and I've written a book about it called "The International Bank of Bob" (Walker/Bloomsbury, March 5, 2013).

I hope the book will get more people to feel a greater understanding of Kiva, a better appreciation of the role of microfinance, and most of all, more connected to the rest of the world.
teams.description: People who realize that if we switched places with the recipients, they'd loan to us just as happily.  So, fair's fair.

teams.name: Kuwait

teams.name: Int. Starseed Network
teams.loan_because: In light of recent events it is obvious that humanity must work together to co-create a world that every man, woman, child and animal can safely participate in. It is up to us as citizens of earth to unite and reach out to our human family. The government is not at fault for the poverty of the world. We are because we refuse to reach out and unite but it is time to change this! It is up to us to make sure no one is left behind. It is our responsibility to make sure ALL benefit from the fruits of life.
teams.description:
We are pioneers of a new earth. A new energy in which we all support one another financially and in spirit. Our goal is to set the stage for change!. We are not at all perfect but we all have a vision of a perfect world. How do we manifest our vision? by utilizing the most wonderful resources God has given us...US! We are our own catalyst for change. Change begins with us and everything currently occurring in the world proves that it is currently time to change. As of today it is no longer important to focus on personal issues, on who is wrong or right or who did what. The earth is changing and we must change with her.

Time is of the essence and our spirits tell us that we should begin to support one another whatever way possible. To eliminate, poverty, hunger, crime, drugs etc we must first remove the conditions which lead many in the world to such desperate measures. By just helping one citizen of earth across the ocean build a business of their own and live their dreams, We are aiding in the co-creation of a new life, new dreams, a new earth. Join our lending team and give whatever you can whenever you can. As a member of the starseed network lending team you can make a powerful impact as a team. The more people involved the stronger the energy of change will be. Unite as one to give to many!

Gandhi once said: Be the change you wish to see in the world. This change begins with us! this is why we are here! Get involved in ending poverty and watch not only the lives of strangers across the world grow and flourish but also our own. The energy you put out is the energy you will receive. Let us unite to bring positive energy in to the world. Through our efforts we can begin the process of 5D earth, right here right now.

teams.name: Colorful Colorado
teams.loan_because: we care and want  to help.This is a great way to help hard working people around the World achieve their dreams.
teams.description: Colorado cares and wants to put an end to World poverty.

teams.name: Green Partnerships
teams.loan_because: We want to help create more sustainable and equitable communities all around the world.
teams.description:
We lend to individuals and groups engaged in businesses and services that help them earn a living but also help to protect the environment in their part of the world. We also strive to build green partnerships in our own communities by supporting the women and men who provide businesses, services, and products that benefit people and the Earth. 

Some of our team members mainly fund green loans, while others choose to designate a fraction of their loans to green enterprises. These are examples of just some of the loans Green Partnerships has helped to fund:

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

***TEAM WEBSITE***
http://apluskiva.wordpress.com/

***TEAM RESOURCES***

http://goo.gl/wtDkJ

www.tinyurl.com/AASFSHNR-MFIs

teams.name: Australia
teams.loan_because:
Australians all let us rejoice
for we are young and free,    -   
We've heard the call of nations wide,
How can we let this be?    -   
We'll share our wealth,
We'll make the change,
We'll help to set them free   -   
From us to them
and back again, 
As one we all shall be      - 

(Thanks to member Jean for this one)

Find us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=97953452142

teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

teams.name: 65th Street Change Gang
teams.loan_because: We seek to promote change through community service.  We recognize that our community is part of the rest of the world
teams.description: The 65th Street Change Gang is a neighborhood manifestation of hope and change.  Our members, who live primarily in north Seattle, Washington, many on or near NE 65th Street, are a diverse, bipartisan group of many ages and backgrounds, who have been inspired to come together to promote change.  Anyone anywhere who wants to help change the lives of those less fortunate is welcome to join the lending team.

teams.name: Calgary, Canada
teams.loan_because: Living in such a great city as Calgary with all the opportunities that entails, surely we can make an effort to help others less fortunate. We all can make a big difference with just a small loan.
teams.description:
This team is for residents of Calgary, former residents, people wtih friends and family here or for anyone who really loves the city!

To those who do not wish to receive an email when messages are posted to the board, there is a simple fix: Go to your portfolio, then your account, then email preferences and you can disable/enable from there. I myself have turned it off as I am a member of several groups and do not want to receive masses of emails.

teams.name: Kiva Detroit
teams.loan_because: We want to champion small businesses in Detroit!
teams.description:
Kiva Detroit is the first Kiva City, a program where Kiva works with community organizations in the United States to provide local small businesses with microloans. 

The goal of the Kiva Detroit team is to empower Detroiters to champion local small businesses through Kiva. 

To double your impact, your loan to a Kiva Detroit borrower will be matched 1-to-1 by the Knight Foundation

teams.name: Team Europe
teams.loan_because: We think Kiva is a unique opportunity for people all over the world to assist entrepreneurs in improving their businesses and communities.
teams.description: We are European lenders (EU, EFTA, and all those who feel they belong) who share the belief in Kiva's vision.

teams.name: Poverty2Prosperity.org - Poverty-Escape
teams.loan_because: Poverty2Prosperity.org (P2P) is all about Poverty-Escape. Please join our fun team and put Poverty-Escape in the lead!  See how to get your I'm a Kiva Loaner Bracelet and more by participating on Team P2P - visit our web site for details!
teams.description:
One of P2P's major poverty-escaping projects is to participate in making microloans through the Kiva platform. See the web site for details on all of our projects. Also see our Perpetual Fund lender account which allows people to designate funds for perpetual loaning here on Kiva, http://www.kiva.org/lender/P2PPerpetualFund

We have a special purpose fund to keep loans from expiring. Please join us at http://poverty2prosperity.org/sosloans to see currently funding loans from the SOS Loan fund.

NOTE:  Poverty2Prosperity is also a non-profit, and any messages not related to Kiva or Poverty2Prosperity may be deleted.  If there is an idea you would like to share, contact one of the Team Captains to get permission.  Thank you for your consideration.

teams.name: Kiva Walk
teams.loan_because: Because we know the benefit of someone providing a 'hand up' both in our work and throughout our life.
teams.description: Founded by a 8.5 month walk across the USA in 2010, the KivaWalk Lending Team is a growing movement of Kiva champions that use walking to teach and instill Kiva's mission while also connecting us to the profound benefits of life at 3mph.

teams.name: KivaFriends.org
teams.loan_because: we are a diverse group of people with diverse reasons for participating on Kiva.org, but with a unifying desire to alleviate poverty around the world through making microloans to the hard working poor.
teams.description: We are a community for lenders by lenders. We welcome Kiva.org lenders to participate in our lender forums at KivaFriends.org

teams.name: Intel Small Things Challenge
teams.loan_because: Every small, individual action can make a big difference -- especially if millions participate. A modest micro-loan will give an entrepreneur a hand-up to start a new business and provide for his or her family.
teams.description:
Intel is the corporate sponsor of the Small Things Challenge. The company is providing financial support as well as providing opportunities throughout the year to increase global awareness for the issues addressed by the Small Things Challenge – providing opportunities so children in developing countries can attend primary school and their parents can earn higher incomes.
The Intel Small Things Challenge builds upon Intel’s 40 years of active involvement in education. The company is again investing about $100 million in education in 2009. Over the last decade, Intel has invested over $1 billion and Intel employees have donated more than 2 million hours towards improving education in 50 countries.  
Individuals can provide support and find more information about the Small Things Challenge – including the online petition and a video featuring musicians and actors who support the cause – at www.smallthingschallenge.com.

NOTE:  Poverty2Prosperity is also a non-profit, and any messages not related to Kiva or Poverty2Prosperity may be deleted.  If there is an idea you would like to share, contact one of the Team Captains to get permission.  Thank you for your consideration.

teams.name: Sunset Casino
teams.loan_because:
Kleinstkredite sind ein ideales Werkzeug bei der Hilfe zur Selbsthilfe.
Damit geben wir Menschen die Möglichkeit sich selbst aus der Armut zu befreien und ihre Familien zu ernähren.
teams.description:
Wir hoffen, dass sehr viele unserer Spieler bei diesem Team mitmachen und damit vielen Menschen ein Schritt in die richtige Richtung ermöglicht wird.
Danke
Paul

teams.name: Global Business Society of UWT
teams.loan_because: We care about humanity and would like to invest our resources into those who wish to use business to create a sustainable and better future for themselves and others.
teams.description: Our organization is located on the University of Washington Tacoma Campus but we are dedicated to making a difference all over the globe. Our mission is as following: The Global Business Society (GBS) connects students to global businesses and international concepts with a focus on raising awareness of global issues and sustainability of profits, people, and planet which are reinforced by our active commitment to helping alleviate these issues in our local community and around the world.

teams.name: University of Washington Tacoma
teams.loan_because: We want to make a difference as students right away.  We are not willing to put off change for the future.
teams.description: Students working together to make a sustainable difference in the fight against global poverty.

teams.name: GLBT (Gay, Lesbian, Bisexual, Transgender) Kivans & Friends
teams.loan_because: We are out and proud and know what it is like to face barriers. We are privileged to help our entrepreneurs achieve their own equality. We thank our friends who join us in our loans & in supporting GLBT rights.
teams.description: We are gay, lesbian, bisexual, transgender, homosexual, and heterosexual people from all over the world.

teams.name: United Church of Christ
teams.loan_because: God is still speaking!
teams.description: We believe that in Jesus Christ, God has come close to us and draws us closer to each other. This is the message of the Bible, which we accept as the testimony of God's loving relationship with humanity. But because we're a very diverse community and we don't impose "tests" of the faith on anyone, there's a diversity of opinion in the UCC about what the Bible says, or how God is speaking to us through scripture, reason, tradition and experience. We believe that God has spoken, and is still speaking.

teams.name: Kiva Christians
teams.loan_because:
Pure and undefiled religion before God the Father is this: to care for orphans and widows in their misfortune and to keep oneself unstained by the world. (Jam. 1:27) http://whoisjesus-really.com/

Link to information regarding Christian partners       
http://goo.gl/LU3hzz
teams.description: A group of believers in Jesus Christ, brought together through a common purpose: to help those in need around the world.

teams.name: Netherlands
teams.loan_because: het mensen helpt een zelfstandig bestaan op te bouwen.
teams.description: FairSpirit microkrediet promoot Kiva in Nederland. Doe jij ook mee met het FairSpirit team?

teams.name: Team New England
teams.loan_because: we believe given the opportunity, every individual has within them the ability to make a difference. Our aim is to afford those opportunities to individuals looking to change their lives and in doing so better their community.
teams.description: We are New Englanders, located in the northeast corner of the United States. We hail from towns dotted along the Green Mountains of Vermont and the sandy coastlines of the Bay and Ocean States. The White Mountains and wilderness of (the free state) New Hampshire and the Gold Coast of Connecticut we call our home. The dense forests of Maine lend us the Pine Tree emblem affixed upon our flag proudly uniting the region for hundreds of years and today our cause for empowering people around the world. We welcome anyone who wishes to join us!

teams.name: Friends of Bob Harris
teams.loan_because:
After stumbling into a job as a luxury travel writer, I saw so much poverty that I decided to turn those paychecks into Kiva loans. Then I visited a bunch of clients, who were amazing, and I've written a book about it called "The International Bank of Bob" (Walker/Bloomsbury, March 5, 2013).

I hope the book will get more people to feel a greater understanding of Kiva, a better appreciation of the role of microfinance, and most of all, more connected to the rest of the world.
teams.description: People who realize that if we switched places with the recipients, they'd loan to us just as happily.  So, fair's fair.

teams.name: Nansen
teams.loan_because: Global changes starts with local actions
teams.description: Nansen is a digital agency based in Stockholm, London, Chicago, New York and Washington D.C

teams.name: Australia
teams.loan_because:
Australians all let us rejoice
for we are young and free,    -   
We've heard the call of nations wide,
How can we let this be?    -   
We'll share our wealth,
We'll make the change,
We'll help to set them free   -   
From us to them
and back again, 
As one we all shall be      - 

(Thanks to member Jean for this one)

Find us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=97953452142
teams.description: Kiva Loaners in Australia

teams.name: Odd Fellows
teams.loan_because: We believe in helping other people with no personal gain. Since one of our core values is to help people in need, Kiva loaning is a natural part of our work.
teams.description: The founder of this team is lodge 77 Olaus Petri in Stockholm, Sweden, but all lodges (and their members) around the world are of course welcome to join.

teams.name: Photoburst - Travel Photography
teams.loan_because: We want to help people who wouldn't qualify for bank loans to improve their lives through their own work.
teams.description:
One year after we started photoburst.net, a travel photography website, our perception of the world has changed immensely... 
We don't want to use or associate ourselves to the fuzzy "responsible travel" concept.
By creating this team, we just hope people with travel and/or photography as common interests come together with a higher purpose. 
Anyone is welcome to join us!

teams.name: Kiva Muslims
teams.loan_because:
002.271 Yusuf Ali Translation:
If ye disclose (acts of) charity, even so it is well, but if ye conceal them, and make them reach those (really) in need, that is best for you: It will remove from you some of your (stains of) evil. And Allah is well acquainted with what ye do.
teams.description: Insha'Allah our team will be a collaboration of people from all walks of life united by one goal: to help those less fortunate and displaying great appreciation to our creator for blessing us to help make a differerence in the world.
